title: Sony & Sony Style logos
content:
Hi Folks,

The "SONY" logo looks like an extended Clarendon Wide Bold, and the "sony style" part is probably custom -- but, if anyone can get a definite id, I'd be grateful.

Thanks in advance,

Amy

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425045105im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sonystylelogo_6051.gif)
author: abecedarienne

comments.content:
Didn't our own Miles [Newlyn](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425045105/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Newlyn) have some involvement with updating the Sony brand? Or was that Honda? Another Japanese company with a slab serif wordmark.

Slightly OT his site at [newlyn.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425045105/http:/www.newlyn.com/) seems to be down. I tried yesterday as well, I was looking for confirmation on the Newlyn connection with the [Hutch](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425045105/http:/typophile.com/node/21295) logo.

Richard
